title: Teams V2: Taskbar icon can not show notification number.
body:
**Describe the bug**
Teams V2: Taskbar icon can not show notification number

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Receive new message

**Expected behavior**
Show green number at taskbar icon

**Screenshots**
![image](https://github.com/IsmaelMartinez/teams-for-linux/assets/29405216/e31720c5-cf9d-46b2-8aae-ecfc1c5ca0d8)

**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
 - OS: Ubuntu 20.04
 - teams-for-linux Version 1.4.39

**Additional context**
Teams V1 can show this green number, but V2 can not show, my config.json like below: 

```
{
	"optInTeamsV2": true,
	"useMutationTitleLogic": true,
        "defaultNotificationUrgency": "critical"
}

```
